TopicTitle: Quite Possibly the Hardest Thing I've Landed Yet

Articles.Content:
This took countless hours of fine tuning the design, and then more hours trying to land it. More times than not, I would run out of fuel and smash into the Mun at 300m/s. Not anymore. I present to you, my first Mun Base. I\'m unoriginally calling it Moon Base Alpha. It landed only 7km from the remains of Mun Lander I (not shown in pictures).

> ![screenshot11o.png](http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/1360/screenshot11o.png)
> ![screenshot12ps.png](http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/7153/screenshot12ps.png)
> 
> ![screenshot13x.png](http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/5295/screenshot13x.png)
> 
> ![screenshot14a.png](http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/6033/screenshot14a.png)
> 
> ![screenshot15z.png](http://img151.imageshack.us/img151/8797/screenshot15z.png)
> 
> ![screenshot17bq.png](http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/3281/screenshot17bq.png)
> 
> ![screenshot18o.png](http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/8527/screenshot18o.png)
> 
> ![screenshot19h.png](http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/930/screenshot19h.png)
> 
> ![screenshot22x.png](http://img607.imageshack.us/img607/4282/screenshot22x.png)

It uses a mix of Nova\'s BACE Construction, Probodobodyne, KW Challenger, and stock parts.

And through this landing, all I lost was 1 landing leg ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
300km/s is pretty darn fast. Are you sure it\'s not 300m/s? ;P

The title is what she said.

But nice job! It\'s landed, and has not exploded.

It looks pretty awesome. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Nice! I\'ve got to put a base on the Mun. Well, first I\'ve got to have a successful return trip...

> 
> 300km/s is pretty darn fast. Are you sure it\'s not 300m/s? ;P

good catch. I\'ll fix that lol.

> 
> good catch. I\'ll fix that lol.

Nothing quite like coming back home to greet your great granchildren and looking the same age as them.
